arts.ttl: Saint-Étienne hierarchy express ‘shame’ after historic drubbing against OGC Nice
arts.sum: It was a historic night at the Allianz Riviera, as was expected. OGC Nice were celebrating their 120th anniversary as they welcomed AS Saint-Étienne. What wasn’t expected was that more…

arts.ttl: Eight-goal Nice demolishes hapless Saint-Etienne in historic French rout
arts.sum: Evan Guessand scored a beautiful individual goal in the 36th and Moukoko added his second and Nice’s sixth three minutes later to leave Saint-Etienne reeling. Mohamed-Ali Cho was rampant and he scored the third in the 24th followed by Youssoufa Moukoko two minutes later.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | OGC Nice 8-0 Saint-Étienne – Le Gym make history in demolition
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 5, 20/09/24 Luke Entwistle reporting from Nice OGC Nice recorded an emphatic 8-0 victory against AS Saint-Étienne, making history by becoming the first team to net six…

arts.ttl: OGC Nice make Ligue 1 history in first-half drubbing of Saint-Étienne
arts.sum: OGC Nice made history in their first-half drubbing of AS Saint-Étienne, becoming the first team in the 21st century to score six goals in the first half of a Ligue…

arts.ttl: Saint-Étienne predicted XI v OGC Nice: Olivier Dall’Oglio set to pick unchanged side
arts.sum: Olivier Dall’Oglio has a significant injury list to contend with as AS Saint-Étienne look to build on their first victory of the season when they travel to the Allianz Riviera…

arts.ttl: Nice predicted XI v Saint-Étienne: Moise Bombito returns for injury-hit Gym
arts.sum: Moise Bombito’s return from suspension is a minor positive in what is a run of bad luck for OGC Nice in the medical department. Bombito returns following his one-game suspension,…

arts.ttl: OGC Nice 24-25 Third Kit Released - 120-Year Anniversary
arts.sum: Le Coq Sportif yesterday released Nice's 24-25 third shirt, which pays homage to the club's original blue and black colours adopted in 1904.
